definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
(phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]

sentences.english: Using quartz ceramic roller is the successful crux of furnace for glass horizontal tempering.
sentences.chinese: 采用石英陶瓷辊子是水平钢化玻璃炉成功的关键。

sentences.english: The enclosure is made of toughened glass with well impulsion-withs.
sentences.chinese: 钢化玻璃罩，具有较强的抗冲击能力，并有红，黄。

sentences.english: The original glass has been transformed into the aluminum alloy windows, with gauze.
sentences.chinese: 原来的钢化玻璃已经改造成了铝合金窗户，带纱网。

sentences.english: Toughened glass cover and hydraulic stay bar.
sentences.chinese: 钢化玻璃盖板，液压撑杆。

sentences.english: Die cast aluminum housing, Silastic ring, Tempered glass.
sentences.chinese: 铝压铸外壳，硅橡胶密封圈，钢化玻璃。

sentences.english: Lars black titanium and toughened glass perfect combination, the beauty is generous.
sentences.chinese: 拉斯黑钛与钢化玻璃完美结合，美观大方。

sentences.english: The slide of the large armored glass windows is activated by some high power engines.
sentences.chinese: 大片的钢化玻璃窗户需要利用大型机械设备进行调节。

sentences.english: Stainless steel, glass on the front and back.
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢机身，在正面和背面是钢化玻璃。

definition: acetal resin/Delrin/unplasticized polyvinyl chloride (uPVC or rigid PVC)
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
